string.text:
The .338 Federal is a rifle cartridge based on the .308 Winchester case necked up to .33 caliber. It was created by Federal Cartridge and Sako in 2006 and intended as a big game cartridge with reasonable recoil for lightweight rifles.
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Highest pierced armor class: %c[ui_gray_1]IV
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Tissue damage rating: %c[ui_gray_1]very high

DVL-10 is a lightweight and compact sniper rifle in proprietary and current military subsonic calibers has been developed for special service and combat missions where exceptional accuracy and range are needed.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for picatinny/weaver except of red dot sights.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: None

DVL-10 is a lightweight, compact, and silenced rifle in proprietary and current military subsonic calibers and has been developed for special service and combat missions where exceptional accuracy and range are needed.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for picatinny/weaver except of red dot sights.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: Integrated
